      Checks if current move is legal and returns false if it is illegal if the piece is a king, allow backwards and forwards movement if a chain of moves is possible, take all moves in the chain if the square is empty, and not white, allow movement by returning true

      boolean Checker.illegalPlacement(Checker Checker, Checker[] Checkers, java.lang.String[][] coordinates)
      sets the white tiles' coordinates to 'null' so that no pieces can be placed on them if the user attempts to place a piece on a null tile or a tile with a piece already in that tile, the method returns true so that the piece cannot be placed
